data.text:
The meeting lasted so long, 
that Taiki Shuttle's training time had come to an end…!
data.processed:
<story>The meeting lasted so long, 
<story>that Taiki Shuttle's training time had come to an end…!

data.text:
And so, I headed to the training course. 
Taiki Shuttle was standing there and looked really depressed…
data.processed:
<story>And so, I headed to the training course. 
<story>Taiki Shuttle was standing there and looked really depressed…

data.text:
Uu… 
UuuuUuu~…!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Uu… 
<story>UuuuUuu~…!

data.text: Ah…!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Ah…!!

data.text:
Uwaaaaaaaaaah!! 
Trainer-saaaaaaaaaaan!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Uwaaaaaaaaaah!! 
<story>Trainer-saaaaaaaaaaan!!

data.text: (fieldaaaaaam!!)
data.processed: <story>(fieldaaaaaam!!)

data.text:
…The tearful hug she gave me, 
was more like an intense tackle.
data.processed:
<story>…The tearful hug she gave me, 
<story>was more like an intense tackle.

data.text: Hicc, hic…
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: Have you calmed down a bit…?
Have you calmed down a bit…?

data.processed: <story>Hicc, hic…

data.text:
Yeah… Trainer-san, 
I'm sorry for surprising you like that.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Yeah… Trainer-san, 
<story>I'm sorry for surprising you like that.

data.text:
I'm, really bad at being lonely… I just get more and more 
depressed, and can't help but start crying…
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>I'm, really bad at being lonely… I just get more and more 
<story>depressed, and can't help but start crying…

data.text:
Today, while I was training with my friends, 
I was completely fine when we were talking…
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Today, while I was training with my friends, 
<story>I was completely fine when we were talking…

data.text:
But one by one, everyone started heading home… 
I was left behind… Trainer-san wasn't here either…
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>But one by one, everyone started heading home… 
<story>I was left behind… Trainer-san wasn't here either…

data.text: Uu… hicc…!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Uu… hicc…!!

data.text:
She was constantly surrounded by her friends 
normally, but it seemed that she became considerably 
lonely when left on her own…
data.processed:
<story>She was constantly surrounded by her friends 
<story>normally, but it seemed that she became considerably 
<story>lonely when left on her own…

data.text: Hicc, hic… oh?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Hicc, hic… oh?

data.text:
…Sorry. I cried alot, 
but now it looks like that made me really hungry.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: Let's go get something good to eat

data.processed:
<story>…Sorry. I cried alot, 
<story>but now it looks like that made me really hungry.

data.text:
Since I was late and wasn't there for her training, as an 
apology, I took Taiki Shuttle with me to a family restaurant.
data.processed:
<story>Since I was late and wasn't there for her training, as an 
<story>apology, I took Taiki Shuttle with me to a family restaurant.

data.text: Oh, a family restaurant!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Oh, a family restaurant!!

data.text:
Lots on the menu! Lots of drinks!! 
I really like this place!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: Go ahead and order whatever you want
choices.processed: <size=42>Go ahead and order whatever you want</size>

choices.text: Go ahead and order whatever you want
choices.processed: <size=42>Go ahead and order whatever you want</size>

data.processed:
<story>Lots on the menu! Lots of drinks!! 
<story>I really like this place!!

data.text:
Really?! Trainer-san, 
you're kind of a fatty aren't you?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Really?! Trainer-san, 
<story>you're kind of a fatty aren't you?

data.text:
…Oh, was that a rude way to put it? 
Sorry, um… a real glutton!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>…Oh, was that a rude way to put it? 
<story>Sorry, um… a real glutton!

data.text:
What should I get…?! Steak? 
Hamburger? Special deluxe parfait…?!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>What should I get…?! Steak? 
<story>Hamburger? Special deluxe parfait…?!

data.text: …I'll get all of them!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>…I'll get all of them!!

data.text:
I let her eat until she 
was completely satsified.
data.processed:
<story>I let her eat until she 
<story>was completely satsified.

data.text:
…For now, I'll ignore the fact that 
my wallet has gotten alot thinner.
data.processed:
<story>…For now, I'll ignore the fact that 
<story>my wallet has gotten alot thinner.

data.text:
Puhaa!! Thank you, Trainer-san! 
I'm so happy, now that I'm full!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Puhaa!! Thank you, Trainer-san! 
<story>I'm so happy, now that I'm full!!

data.text:
But, well, Japan's steak is a 
little on the small side, isn't it?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>But, well, Japan's steak is a 
<story>little on the small side, isn't it?

data.text:
The steak I've eaten with my 
family is twice… no, 3 times as thick!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>The steak I've eaten with my 
<story>family is twice… no, 3 times as thick!

data.text:
…How nostalgic. I used to talk 
alot with my friends and family while eating…
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>…How nostalgic. I used to talk 
<story>alot with my friends and family while eating…

data.text: Everyone… I want to see them again…
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Everyone… I want to see them again…

data.text:
Taiki Shuttle slowly became more dejected. For someone 
who gets lonely easily like her, the bitterness of 
being home sick must be pretty severe…

choices.text: So you don't get lonely, I'll be here
So you don't get lonely, I'll be here

data.text:
…!! 
Trainer-san…!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:

<story>Trainer-san…!!

data.text:
…Thank you!! 
Thank you very much!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>…Thank you!! 
<story>Thank you very much!!

data.text:
I'm not going home any time soon! 
At least not until I win the Twinkle Series!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>I'm not going home any time soon! 
<story>At least not until I win the Twinkle Series!!

data.text:
For the family and friends I love, 
who all cheered me on.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>For the family and friends I love, 
<story>who all cheered me on.

data.text:
When I win, they always 
show me their happy smiles!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>When I win, they always 
<story>show me their happy smiles!

data.text:
Seeing everyone with happy smiles is my favorite! 
For me, that's the thing that makes me the happiest!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Seeing everyone with happy smiles is my favorite! 
<story>For me, that's the thing that makes me the happiest!

data.text:
That's why… even if I get lonely, 
I'm going to do my best!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>That's why… even if I get lonely, 
<story>I'm going to do my best!!

data.text: With Trainer-san here, I can keep doing my best!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: Yeah, let's both do our best!!

data.processed: <story>With Trainer-san here, I can keep doing my best!!

data.text:
Yes!! Let's make them show 
us their happy smiles, together!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
<story>Yes!! Let's make them show 
<story>us their happy smiles, together!

data.text:
And with these renewed feelings, 
Taiki Shuttle and I would aim for victory…!
data.processed:
<story>And with these renewed feelings, 
<story>Taiki Shuttle and I would aim for victory…!

data.text: …however.

data.text: Ahhh! That's Dober over there!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

data.text: Howdy, my frieeeeeeeeend!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: <story>Howdy, my frieeeeeeeeend!!

data.processed: <story>Doberrrrrrr~~~!!

…looks like Taiki Shuttle still 
has a long, long way to go.
